name: Space! (Blackbirbb)
description:
A simple 3d space shooter/exploration game, made for 7DFPS Jam 2021

There's no real "objective" to the game yet, just fly around, do some barrel rolls, shoot some spaceships (some of them shoot back tho).

NOTE : There is no pause menu yet so you'll need to force quit the game with Alt+F4 , sorry for the inconvenience
